text:
The Eurovision Song Contest 2019 was the 64th edition of the Eurovision Song Contest and took place in Israel's capital Tel Aviv, after Netta won for her country in Lisbon, Portugal last year.
Duncan Laurence from the Netherlands won the contest.
Venue.
The contest happened in Expo Tel Aviv, Tel Aviv, Israel. The venue holds 7,300 people.
Semi-final 1.
The first semi-final happened on 14 May 2019 at 22:00 IDT (21:00 CEST). Seventeen countries participated in the first semi-final. Those countries plus France, Israel and Spain voted in this semi-final.
The highlighted countries qualified for the final.
Semi-final 2.
The second semi-final happened on 16 May 2019 at 22:00 IDT (21:00 CEST). Eighteen countries participated in the second semi-final. Those countries plus
Germany, Italy, and the United Kingdom voted in this semi-final.
The highlighted countries qualified for the final.
Final.
The final happened on 18 May 2019 at 22:00 IDT (21:00 CEST). Twenty-six countries participated in the final, with all 41 participating countries eligible to vote.
